data.text:
We had a very relaxing Family stay at Taj Exotica Dubai. We have choosen an upgrade to have a sea view and I would definitely recommend it. The Dinner Barbecue was perfect and our cook Sunil R. prepared us delicious King Prawns. Service was top notch! They cleaned our room 2-3 x a day. At each pool are at least 2-3 Lifeguards. The parking service was quick so there is no stress to think about where to park, just hand over the keys and relax. The breakfast was very big with a wide selection of different meals. We also played mini golf and Padel Tenis. Padel Tenis is an extra charge of 120AED for one hour which is also an OK price. 

We were very satisfied and the kids want to come back, too.
data.title: Exotic Paradise on  Palm Jumeirah

data.text: It is an incredible hotel with a great location and fantastic service. The hotel gave us a very warm welcome and accommodated all of our needs, including allowing us to check in at 9am. The food was incredible, especially the fine dining Indian cuisine, which can be sent to your room. I found the service at this hotel to be unparalleled, with a special thanks to Vikas and the concierge team, who went out of their way to ensure my wife and I enjoyed everything Dubai had to offer.
data.title: Fantastic hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Richarddunc,
Greetings from Taj Exotica Resort & Spa!
Thank you for sharing your feedback and leaving a review.
I am delighted to note you had a great stay with us, liked the service that the team including Vikas from concierge has provided. It is feedback like yours that encourages our team to deliver their best.
We look forward to welcoming you again and continuing to meet your expectations.
Warm regards,
Nayan Seth
General Manager
owner_response.author: Nayan Seth

data.text: Amazing service where the staff went of their way to make our family holiday extremely enjoyable. Special mention to Himanshu who showed us around as we checked in and was always available if we needed anything. The manager and Diksha in the lounge who were attentive and made us feel welcome. The team at breakfast, Raia  and in the Emperor Lounge and last but not least, Awais from housekeeping who always checked in if we need anything more. Absolutely brilliant stay and would highly recommend if you are looking for great service.
data.title: Five star stay at a 5 star hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear S_Shah2016
Greetings from Taj Exotica Resort & Spa.
Thank you for taking the time to share your review on TripAdvisor.	
I am delighted to know that you enjoyed the facilities, food and the service that the team has provided namely Himanshu, Diksha and Awais who made your stay special.
We look forward to welcoming you once again and continuing to meet your expectations.
Warm regards,
Nayan Seth
General Manager
owner_response.author: Nayan Seth

data.text:
Great experience at the Taj Exotica. Fantastic hotel, great pool and private beach. Breakfast was top notch with variety, whilst a la carte options at the other restaurants on site were good - particularly Verq and Raya. If the children’s menus had more variety - I.e. ability to choose off main menus rather than exclusively off children’s menu - that would be great.
Staff were all universally friendly and welcoming. 
Gym was good with top quality equipment.
Rooms were very well kept,  spacious and very comfortable.
Nice to be away from all the hustle and bustle but easily commutable to the other areas/sites of interest.
Thank you to all at The Taj.
data.title: Great Easter break

owner_response.title: Owner response

data.text:
I wouldn't even give a 1* if there was an option!!! 

We returned to the Taj after 6 months super excited as our first stay last year was amazing! This time... where to start...

Managers not accountable for actions!! Spoke to 5 different managers in 1 week. And all had to be chased for an outcome! 

Ruined my Louis Vuitton purchase because they couldn't follow simple instructions in concierge like leave my purchase on the bed. Instead it was left at the door, so when you open the door you literally fall over the bags, and damaged! No accountability was taken at all for the damage. 

Staff not aware on how to pour champagne! If you can't pour why are you working at the bar or restaurant? 

Tables were not cleaned after the last family left and we were made to sit and eat our food there. On complaint nothing was done! 

My daughters night clothing went missing and they were unable to locate it for over 36 hours! Again upon persistence they were finally located! 

Upon request for breakfast I requested that they wash out the egg pan as we were vegetarian and the previous customer had bacon cooked in it. This request was ignored totally and our food cooked in the same pan! So my eggs actually  had bacon it it' which i wasn't going to eat! It went to waste! 

At the roaring rabbit restaurant, we ordered drinks first but they arrived after we had eaten our meals! Totally unacceptable! 

Based on all of this Aditya the night manager had given us access to the Taj Lounge for our final day. Upon arrival at the Taj Lounge we were told we didn't have access. Upon complaining again and explaining who had given us access, Palak the senior manager accused us of lying saying this access was never given but she was not present when Aditya had confirmed this so how would she know? After requesting her to call Aditiya to check it was confirmed we were telling the truth! No apology as yet from management for this accusation either!
data.title: Awful experience
